Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: TMCLEN "tmclen"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that takes video and photo that would be a good starter camera for my 10 year old daughter, this is perfect for the price. Works great, takes reasonable photos and video. You will want to use lithium batteries

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: J. christmas
Reviews.Content: on the bright side, it's light, compact and easy enough to use.  but that is outweighed by how crappy the picture quality is, and the fact that it's practically useless as a camera, unless you just happen to have an extra 20 feet or so to step back and get a decent frame.  might be good for quick, unimportant things you just happen to want to catch on cam, otherwise, find something else.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Quality
Reviews.Author: xxxxx
Reviews.Content: This is what I expected:An OK digital camera that had flash and could take video and decent pictures.This is what I got:An extremely low quality camera that doesn't even have any flash! Also, it's meant to hold upright like a phone which completely eliminates it's camera-like qualities. You also have to put in a memory card to store all of the information, and when you take it out then put it back in, the camera doesn't show any of the pictures you took. It's completely terrible in even the slightest dark, and it doesn't have much zoom, either.I wish I had gotten a decent $50 camera instead of this one.

Reviews.Title: Good cameras for the price
Reviews.Author: Ila W King
Reviews.Content: We bought three of these for our grand-kids to use while visiting us. They had a ball taking videos and still pictures. We took them to places kids ordinarily wouldn't care for, but were educational for them. They took hundreds of pictures to show their parents. One set of batteries lasted them all weekend, which surprised me because they were constantly snapping pictures and then viewing them.For the price you don't get the best resolution and all the fancy features, but they were great for out grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: looks good but function is for children
Reviews.Author: oliverfriendlydog
Reviews.Content: this is a starter camera for kids. we bought it for business, but not useful as i thought it would be, too bad.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Bonnie G
Reviews.Content: This camera only lasted less then a week after giving it as a gift for my daughter. Not exactly sure what happened but complete waste of my money.

Reviews.Title: I love the fact that I can plug it into my ...
Reviews.Author: Halee
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that I can plug it into my computer without having to dig out a cable, but the picture quality is terrible and it has no flash even though it is capable of taking still pictures. Spend the extra money, get a camera that you can actually get good pictures out of.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Ambeliotis
Reviews.Content: I just needed a camera for a photography class. This camera was such poor quality that i actually resorted to using my cell phone

Reviews.Title: Avoid this product
Reviews.Author: Nash
Reviews.Content: The Polaroid DVF-130BC Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.0-Inch LCD works fine if you use the picture taking aspect, but if you want to record in video mode, you are wasting your time. The problem is the batteries will not support this function. Forget about using rechargeable batteries, they will not work at all. If you use non rechargeable batteries the video function works for almost two minutes then you get the F symbol, that F informs the user the batteries are low, to low to run the video mode. I used three types of new batteries and they just are not enough to run the video mode. My estimate is: four double AA would have been enough to run the video mode. Two AA batteries is a poor engineering design. My suggestion is: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Good Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Omo West
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son in elementary school for Christmas. He loves it and uses it often to take pictures

Reviews.Title: Too difficult to use
Reviews.Author: CalBrit
Reviews.Content: I still haven't figured this thing out. The screen is small, the icons tiny. I guess you do get what you pay for. Not worth the bother.

Reviews.Title: Polaroid DVF digital camera with 3x optical zoom and 2.0 inch LCD
Reviews.Author: gwayne171
Reviews.Content: Very good delivery ,and very good video camera I did try it with 16gb sd but didn't read .Tested it with a 2gb and it works great I am waiting for an 8gb as it says to use. I would recommend this product !Videos and down loads and pics also are good quality.  I tried it with a class 4, 8 gb my note book didn't read it .I have ordered a class 6 ,8 gb but if only does a 2 gb it is still worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great to its price
Reviews.Author: joeseph
Reviews.Content: Pros: The unit was inexpensive , and worked very good. I would not recommend this to A photographer but it is great for a Child.Cons: nothing so far

Reviews.Title: Low cost, works great.
Reviews.Author: David Reilly "Raghallch"
Reviews.Content: I bought a couple of these to act as mobile security cameras.  They work pretty well.  Considering purchasing a couple more.

Reviews.Title: kool
Reviews.Author: Windy
Reviews.Content: well its not a high end cam but does a good job in the day not so good in the night but cud live with it

ProductInfo.Features:
Digital camcorder with 3.0 MegaPixel and 2.0-Inch LCD display
Built-in USB stick for easy download
YouTube DV, VGA @ 30fps
SD Compatible
AA Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid DVF-130BC Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.0-Inch LCD Screen, Black
